column5: I've always liked to use my CC for most purchases in Canada and abroad. Most card companies have recently added fees for exchange. Here's two companies that DO NOT charge for currency exchange. I have no connections to either - just some research I did. Town North Bank platinum master card - 877-866-2265 Pulaski Bank visa gold - 800-217-7715
I use my Cabela's card, they charge 1% fee but I get the points so it about balances out.
